statements: SELECT * FROM LandUsePatterns
SELECT id, area_name, land_type FROM LandUsePatterns ORDER BY land_area DESC
SELECT area_name, land_type FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE green_space_potential = TRUE
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, land_area FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE land_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY id
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, green_space_potential FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE land_area > 1000
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, land_area, green_space_potential FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE land_area > 100 ORDER BY land_area DESC;
SELECT area_name, SUM(land_area) AS total_land_area FROM LandUsePatterns GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT id, area_name, land_type, land_area FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE land_type = 'Residential' AND green_space_potential = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM LandUsePatterns ORDER BY area_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT area_name, AVG(land_area) AS avg_land_area FROM LandUsePatterns GROUP BY area_name HAVING AVG(land_area) > 200;
SELECT * FROM land_use_patterns;
SELECT area_name, land_type FROM land_use_patterns WHERE green_space_available = TRUE;
SELECT area_name, green_space_available FROM land_use_patterns WHERE land_type = 'Residential';
SELECT area_name, expansion_date, expansion_area FROM land_use_patterns JOIN green_space_expansion ON land_use_patterns.area_id = green_space_expansion.area_id;
SELECT * FROM green_space_expansion WHERE expansion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM land_use_patterns WHERE green_space_available = TRUE ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, land_type FROM land_use_patterns WHERE land_type = 'Residential' AND green_space_available = TRUE;
SELECT area_name, expansion_date, expansion_area FROM land_use_patterns JOIN green_space_expansion ON land_use_patterns.area_id = green_space_expansion.area_id;
SELECT area_name, SUM(expansion_area) AS total_expansion_area FROM land_use_patterns JOIN green_space_expansion ON land_use_patterns.area_id = green_space_expansion.area_id GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM green_space_expansion WHERE expansion_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expansion_area > 1000 ORDER BY expansion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandUsePatterns;
SELECT id, area_name, land_type FROM LandUsePatterns ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT area_name, percentage_covered FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE percentage_covered > 50;
SELECT area_name, year FROM LandUseHistory WHERE year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenSpaceExpansion WHERE expansion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY planned_expansion_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE percentage_covered > 50;
SELECT area_name, land_type FROM LandUsePatterns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name, planned_expansion_area, expansion_date FROM GreenSpaceExpansion WHERE expansion_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT land_use_category, year FROM LandUseHistory WHERE year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, area_name FROM LandUseHistory WHERE land_use_category = 'Residential' AND area_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Land_Use_Patterns ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, land_use_type FROM Land_Use_Patterns WHERE land_area > 100;
SELECT green_space_name, green_space_area FROM Green_Space_Expansion WHERE green_space_area BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM User_Reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT area_id, population, facilities FROM Area_Details WHERE population < 50000;
SELECT * FROM Area_Details JOIN Land_Use_Patterns ON Area_Details.area_id = Land_Use_Patterns.area_id;
SELECT green_space_name, green_space_area FROM Green_Space_Expansion WHERE green_space_area > 10000 ORDER BY green_space_area DESC;
SELECT area_name, land_use_type FROM Land_Use_Patterns WHERE land_use_type = 'Residential' AND area_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT review_id, user_id, rating FROM User_Reviews JOIN Green_Space_Expansion ON User_Reviews.green_space_id = Green_Space_Expansion.green_space_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT green_space_name, population FROM Green_Space_Expansion JOIN Area_Details ON Green_Space_Expansion.area_id = Area_Details.area_id WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY green_space_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM land_use_patterns;
SELECT id, area_name, land_type FROM land_use_patterns WHERE green_space_potential = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM green_spaces ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT space_name, location FROM green_spaces WHERE facilities LIKE 'playground%';
SELECT survey_date, surveyor_name, comments FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM land_use_patterns ORDER BY area_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT space_name, location, facilities FROM green_spaces WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY size DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT owner_name, contact_info, area_size FROM land_owners INNER JOIN land_use_patterns ON land_owners.land_area_id = land_use_patterns.id WHERE green_space_potential = true ORDER BY area_size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_id, ST_AsText(boundary_polygon) AS boundary, development_status FROM land_area_details WHERE development_status = 'Under Development' ORDER BY area_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT surveyor_name, survey_date, comments FROM survey_results WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
